title: DOM XSS at `https://adobedocs.github.io/indesign-api-docs/?configUrl={site}` due to outdated Swagger UI

profile.name: Adobe
profile.about: Adobe Vulnerability Disclosure Program and Magento Bug Bounty Program

summaries.content: Adobe thanks @dreamer_eh for the collaboration, thorough writeup, and dedication to improving our security resilience. We look forward to working them again in the future!
